bonus: Effective only on the following platform: "PlayStation Network"Dealing Cryo DMG to opponents increases this character's Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 10% for 6s. This effect can have a maximum of 2 stacks. Additionally, when Aloy equips Predator, ATK is increased by 66.
description: A uniquely-designed bow. This should not belong in this world.
